statements: SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE vulnerability_detected = TRUE;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, resolution FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, resolved_by FROM security_incidents WHERE vulnerability_detected = FALSE ORDER BY resolved_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC, incident_type ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE vulnerability_detected = TRUE;
SELECT incident_description, resolution, resolved_by FROM security_incidents WHERE resolved_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY resolved_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND incident_type IN ('Breach', 'Malware');
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_description ILIKE '%password%';
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, incident_date, severity_level FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity_level > 3;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, reported_by FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM IncidentResolutions WHERE resolved_by = 'IT Support' ORDER BY resolved_date;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity_level = 3 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date, reported_by FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity_level > 2 LIMIT 5;

SELECT incident_description, COUNT(resolution_id) AS resolution_count FROM SecurityIncidents LEFT JOIN IncidentResolutions ON SecurityIncidents.incident_id = IncidentResolutions.incident_id GROUP BY incident_description ORDER BY resolution_count DESC;

SELECT si.incident_description, ir.resolution_description, ir.resolved_date FROM SecurityIncidents AS si INNER JOIN IncidentResolutions AS ir ON si.incident_id = ir.incident_id WHERE ir.resolved_by = 'John Doe' OR ir.resolved_by = 'Jane Smith';

SELECT incident_id, incident_description, resolved_date FROM SecurityIncidents LEFT JOIN IncidentResolutions ON SecurityIncidents.incident_id = IncidentResolutions.incident_id WHERE IncidentResolutions.resolved_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY IncidentResolutions.resolved_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, severity FROM security_incidents ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT i.incident_id, i.incident_type, a.analysis_result FROM security_incidents i JOIN incident_analysis a ON i.incident_id = a.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description, analysis_result FROM security_incidents JOIN incident_analysis ON security_incidents.incident_id = incident_analysis.incident_id;
SELECT description, resolution_details FROM security_incidents JOIN resolutions ON security_incidents.incident_id = resolutions.incident_id WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT incident_id, resolution_status, analysis_result FROM resolutions JOIN incident_analysis ON resolutions.incident_id = incident_analysis.incident_id ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, incident_type FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_description, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE severity_level > 3;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM incident_resolutions WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE severity_level > 3;
SELECT analysis_description, analyst_name FROM incident_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT incident_id, resolution FROM incident_resolutions JOIN security_incidents ON incident_resolutions.incident_id = security_incidents.incident_id;
SELECT trend_description, trend_date FROM incident_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_date, incident_description, location FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM incident_resolutions ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_role FROM incident_participants WHERE participant_role = 'Manager';
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM incident_files WHERE incident_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT * FROM incident_resolutions WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT resolution_id, incident_id, resolution_details, resolution_date FROM incident_resolutions ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, location, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
